title: ANZ Bank online banking seems to no longer be compatible with Firefox
content:
Dear Team,

ANZ Bank (Australia) no longer works with Firefox. I troubleshooted with ANZ and they say the issue is with my browser. I have the latest version of Firefox, and I have cleared my cache & history a few times. I have attached a screen shot of where the landing page hangs. The loading circle keeps rotating, but it never loads any further.

Safari & Chrome both load the page fine with no issues.

Just letting you know in case you can sort this out.

Many thanks, Mark Harvey harvey@bigpond.net.au
creator: marksharvey

title: Can't link to outside sites
content: Today, when I logged onto my computer, something went wrong and Windows had to repair my C: drive before it could continue to boot up. Once it did, Firefox was changed. Some of the shortcuts on the windows were missing and I couldn't get them back with the command to "Dismiss" the substitutes. More serious was my new inability to log onto any sites besides Mozilla's. I have tried restarting the computer and turning off my router and turning it back on again. All the while, my Android phone account is able to login to some of these sites without difficulty. I need to diagnose this problem and fix it. How can I do that, please?
creator: harderm

title: Mozilla desktop version 138 website appearance
content:
Hello. 

The problem i am having with several latest versions of firefox just on my desktop version is that it always no matter which search engine i am using it forces the websites to switch to dark mode. i have checked the settings several times and in General , Language and appearance , i have put it in light mode and it didn't help, i have put it in automatic mode and even though my system is in light mode and it's morning it didn't help either i have uninstalled and reinstalled mozilla over and over again and it didn't help either.

title: Google Image Tools NOT Working
content: I go onto google. I search for an image, select the "tools" tab and I attempt to click on any of the options (like image size, for example). The tabs simply don't work. I opened Microsoft Edge and did the same exact thing and it worked. Guys, if Google doesn't work on this browser reliably - you guys are officially in last place for quality. I've cleared my cache, cleared cookies, FireFox is up-to-date, I restarted my PC. I shouldn't have to go through a hassle for something this *simple*. I used to love Mozilla, but y'all keep breaking things. Chrome is no issue, Edge is even faster now. What's the point of using this junk? YouTube pages have been freezing as well. Ima have to switch browsers and I'm definitely going to make sure no one I know sticks with FireFox.
creator: MadManAbraham
